mapper.insert: insert into deal (product_id, group_size, discount_price, status, participant_count, is_private, expired_at, closed_at, version) values (#{productId}, #{groupSize}, #{discountPrice}, #{status}, 1, #{isPrivate}, #{expiredAt}, #{closedAt}, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE deal SET product_id = #{deal.productId}, group_size=#{deal.groupSize}, discount_price=#{deal.discountPrice}, group_size=#{deal.groupSize}, participant_count=#{deal.participantCount}, is_private=#{deal.isPrivate}, expired_at=#{deal.expiredAt}, closed_at=#{deal.closedAt}, version=#{newVersion} WHERE id = #{deal.id} AND version = #{oldVersion}
